page.title: 10Rangemore Park Estate
page.content: Rangemore Park Estate is owned by {Lord Burton}and has been farmed since 1880 when the estate was bought. It covers an area of{2,500 acres}of which {300 acres}is woodland. There are 14 farms, six farming tenants and 48 houses. Altogether there is{a workforce of 11 people} which includes the farm manager, 3 tractor drivers, 4 cowmen, a stockman, a secretary, and a holiday relief worker. A lot of{modern machinery}is used and is usually only kept for about 5 years before it is sold and replaced. The oldest machine on the farm is a seedbox which is 30 years old. There are 9 tractors, one forklift and one ordinary baler.{Combine} {Harvesters}are rented when needed. This is a very big estate and covers more than{three-quarters}of the block.
